  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    AvroJobInfo  
    AvroNamedOutput  
    CombinerInfo  
    Distribute  
    Driver
    Annotation for a Tool class used to kick off a Map/Reduce driver.
    DriverCleanup
    Marker for the method to be called after the MapReduce job completes.
    DriverContext
    Tags a bean as the context for the job.
    DriverInit
    Tags the method to call to initialize the tool.
    FileInput  
    FileOutput  
    Grouping  
    Hidden
    Marks a driver as "hidden" from the container's available drivers list output/display.
    Input  
    JobInfo
    Annotation for configuring a Map/Reduce Job.
    JobInit
    Tags the method to call to initialize the job.
    KeyValue  
    MapperInfo  
    MapperService  
    MultiInput  
    MultiTableInput
    Annotation for specifying input from multiple tables.
    NamedOutput  
    Option
    Denotes a parameter or argument resource supplied to a Tool.
    Partitioner  
    ReducerInfo  
    ReducerService  
    Scanner  
    Sorter  
    TableInput
    Annotation for specifying input from a single table.
    TableOutput  
    Tool
    Annotation for a Tool class used to kick off a Map/Reduce driver.
    ToolCleanup  
    ToolContext  
    ToolInit
    Tags the method to call to initialize the tool.
    Validate
    Tags the method to call to validate CLI arguments.
